title: Need Help
body: When i join a league and we begin the draft phase, screen switches over to the draft then freezes. cant draft, cant talk in league chat box or do anything. seems like everyone else actually does the draft while it auto picks for me because i cant see or do anything.

replies.body: Are you using any third party programs that interact with League?  They can cause issues during champ select, so it may be best to remove it.  Otherwise, let me know if you're on the legacy or updated client and any errors you might be seeing.  Happy to help!
my apologies i should have specified. this is for fantasy league. after a fantasy league is made and we go into draft phase i cant do anything and it auto drafts for me.

Aha, thanks for clearing that up.  I'm thinking that maybe an extension is blocking you from interacting with the site properly.  Otherwise, you might be having a connection problem and can't stay in sync during picks.  My first suggestion would be to try Incognito mode and clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies).  Another browser entirely could work too.  Let me know if that helps!
